analysis.description:
PaymentHolder.withdrawEth (/unique_chucks/14/0x0e6f6ed4581d25944d8c6a595b9f50e11431b754.sol#525-535) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- to.transfer(amount) (/unique_chucks/14/0x0e6f6ed4581d25944d8c6a595b9f50e11431b754.sol#533-535)

PaymentHolder.migrate has external calls inside a loop:
	- balance = Token(token).balanceOf(this) (/unique_chucks/14/0x0e6f6ed4581d25944d8c6a595b9f50e11431b754.sol#496-497)

PaymentHolder.migrate has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(Token(token).transfer(newHolder,balance)) (/unique_chucks/14/0x0e6f6ed4581d25944d8c6a595b9f50e11431b754.sol#500-502)
Token.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/14/0x0e6f6ed4581d25944d8c6a595b9f50e11431b754.sol#7-9)
